<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Employee Seperation">b0cf0962937bb110d0ac703efaba1006</cat_item><cat_variable>IO:52d1112293bbb110d0ac703efaba10f3</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autopupulate Lo, Co and email.</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }
   if (control === 'employee_leaving' && !isLoading) {

	var employeeLeaving = g_form.getValue('employee_leaving');
	if (employeeLeaving) {
		var autopopulateScript = new Autopulate_catalog_item();
	autopopulateScript.populateEmployeeDetails(employeeLeaving);
	}
   }

   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-20 20:57:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>2f127566933fb110d0ac703efaba1014</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autopupulate Lo, Co and email.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_994488_hr">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_2f127566933fb110d0ac703efaba1014</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-20 21:31:28</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
